Sketch Create a new sketch on the X-Y plane of the new coordinate system. Face 1 * Loop 1 + Line 1: Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.0]. + Line 2: Draw a line from point [0.75, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.375]. + Arc 1: Draw an arc with a start point of [0.75, 0.375], a mid point of [0.5206, 0.4998], and an end point of [0.437, 0.7472]. + Line 3: Draw a line from point [0.437, 0.7472] to point [0.0, 0.75]. + Line 4: Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.75] to point [0.0, 0.0] to close the loop. Face 2 * Loop 1 + Line 1: Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.0]. + Line 2: Draw a line from point [0.75, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.375]. + Arc 1: Draw an arc with a start point of [0.75, 0.375], a mid point of [0.5206, 0.4998], and an end point of [0.437, 0.7472]. + Line 3: Draw a line from point [0.437, 0.7472] to point [0.0, 0.75]. + Line 4: Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.75] to point [0.0, 0.0] to close the loop. Extrusion Extrude the sketch along the normal direction with a depth of 0.375 and a scale factor of 0.75. The boolean operation to be used is to create a new body. Description The dimensions of the prism are as follows: * Length: 0.75 units * Width: 0.375 units * Height: 0.75 units The shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. The top and bottom faces are parallel to each other, while the front and back faces are perpendicular to the top and bottom faces. The sides of the prism are straight and meet at right angles. The prism is centered on a white background.</description>
